item.title: WFH Tools and Tips
item.description: Most people working in the tech industry should be familiar with the concept of working from home, albeit periodically.

item.title: ActivityPub: Part 1
item.description: Let’s Federate on ActivityPub ActivityPub is a protocol for decentralized social networks to that allows federation - imagine servers running their own instances of “Twitter” that can speak with each other, across domains.
